org.csstudio.platform.internal.model
Class ControlSystemItemFactoriesRegistry

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.internal.model.ControlSystemItemFactoriesRegistry

public final class ControlSystemItemFactoriesRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

A registry, which provides access to extension that have been provided for the extension point the org.ccstudio.platform.controlSystemItemFactories extension point. For further details please refer to the documentation of that extension point.

Author:
Sven Wende

Nested Class Summary
(package private)  class ControlSystemItemFactoriesRegistry.FactoryDescriptor
          Descriptor for factory extension, which is used to implement the lazy loading pattern that is recommended by the Eclipse plugin mechanism.

getControlSystemItemFactory

public AbstractControlSystemItemFactory getControlSystemItemFactory(java.lang.String typeId)
Gets the control system item factory, which has been registrated for the specified type id.

Parameters:
typeId - the type id
Returns:
a factory, that is responsible for control system items of the specified type or null, if no corresponding factory was registered as plugin extension
